user_instruction: 'Send an update to Sarah (sarah@beaconofhope.org) about our latest intervention strategies. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Update on Latest Intervention Strategies

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please send me (sarah@beaconofhope.org) an update on our latest intervention strategies? Feel free to pull any details you need from your Notion space.

Thank you so much for your help!

Best regards,
Sarah
